official_title: A bill to terminate the application of certain provisions relating to the McColl Site in Fullerton, California.

summary.text: Removes any restrictions on the use of Superfund funds for the transfer or disposal of hazardous waste from the McColl site, Fullerton, California.

titles.title: A bill to terminate the application of certain provisions relating to the McColl Site in Fullerton, California.
